about.subtitle: Get to Know Me
about.title: About Me
about.name: Boubaker CHIEB
about.bio: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience building modern web applications. Specialized in Angular, C#/.NET, and cloud technologies. I thrive on creating clean, scalable solutions that make a real difference.

entries.description: Leading technical architecture and development of fund management applications using .NET Core and Angular with modern patterns.
Developed and maintained leasing management platforms, implementing new features and optimizing existing systems for automotive leasing operations.
Built and maintained banking applications for fund management, implementing complex business rules and real-time data processing.
Developed IoT monitoring platforms and business management solutions, working across the full stack with .NET backend and Angular frontend.
Started professional career developing web applications with ASP.NET MVC, handling database design and frontend integration.

entries.title: Leasing Auto Platform
entries.description: Full-stack leasing management platform for automotive fleet operations with real-time tracking and automated workflows.

entries.title: Welcome Auto System
entries.description: Digital onboarding system for automotive clients with document management and approval workflows.

entries.title: FundAlert Platform
entries.description: Real-time fund alerting and monitoring platform for asset management with configurable alert rules and dashboards.

entries.title: Funds-Factsheet Generator
entries.description: Automated generation of fund factsheets with dynamic data visualization and PDF export capabilities.

entries.title: IoT-Lifting Monitoring
entries.description: IoT-based real-time monitoring platform for lifting equipment with sensor data visualization and predictive alerts.

entries.title: Fund Administration
entries.description: Comprehensive fund administration system handling NAV calculations, investor reporting, and regulatory compliance.
